resources.string: To start receiving offers to your phone,\n tap the Add (+) button to\n add all your loyalty cards today!
Offers not available, check your network connection and try again
Type in your loyalty card number below
All of your in store print coupons will now be sent to your phone.

You\'ve just earned $2.50
towards your PayPal account.

string-array.name: dislike_excuses
string-array.item: I do not like the product.
I do not like the brand.
It does not offer enough savings.

resources.string: Take a picture of your card
Center the barcode between the arrows.\nAllow the camera to focus for quicker scans.
Tap a bar for detailed view
